title: 3 and Out Weekend Mailbag - Mayfield, Notre Dame B1G Buzz, Browns, Packers
itunes:title: 3 and Out Weekend Mailbag - Mayfield, Notre Dame B1G Buzz, Browns, Packers
description:
John answers listener questions in his weekend Mailbag, including Baker’s impact in Carolina, if Notre Dame and Oregon will join the B1G, what he expects from the Deshaun Watson suspension, and if the Packers need an owner.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and FanDuel for the best wagering action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
